documents.title: CSL
documents.summary: AI agent-driven meta-parametric design across CAD/CAE/CAM, BOM, factory automation; Fusion-first multi-backend.

documents.summary: Fusion-first implementation with multi-backend support; add-in setup, file implementations, tests. FreeCAD optional backend remains supported.

documents.title: CSL v1.1 ↔ CAD Backend Gap Analysis
documents.summary: Coverage comparison and gaps; Fusion updated with lineage queries, diagnostics, APS; roadmap status.

documents.title: CSL v1.2 – Fusion Parity and Cross-Backend Extensions (Proposal)
documents.summary: Proposed v1.2 syntax and schema to reach Fusion parity and extend cross-backend features; includes APS Design Automation linkage.

documents.title: CSL (CAD-Specific Language) – Version 1.1
documents.summary: Full language spec covering goals, metadata, params, sketches, features, queries, assemblies, ECAD, exports/thumbnails, backend capabilities, and cheatsheet.

documents.title: CSL JSON IR v1.1 Schema
documents.summary: JSON Schema for the canonical IR, including export/thumbnail ops and backend capabilities.

documents.title: CSL v1.0 Conformance Kit (Starter)
documents.summary: Golden tests for adapter validation: geometry/topology checks, IDs/tags, diagnostics.

documents.summary: Plate with through hole and cosmetic thread metadata.

documents.summary: Loft between circle and rectangle with G1 continuity.
